description: Extracts structured profile data from the chain output of genealogy_target_profiling (4-engine chain). Produces three accordion sections: conceptual_framework, semantic_constellation, and inferential_commitments — matching the genealogy_target_profile view's renderer_config.

frameworks.name: string (framework name)
vocabulary: string (distinctive terms introduced by this framework)
frameworks.methodological_signature: string (how this framework shapes the method of inquiry)

conceptual_framework.summary: string (2-3 sentence overview of the conceptual architecture)

core_concepts.definition: string (how the author defines or uses this term)
related_terms: string (terms that cluster with this concept)

semantic_constellation.vocabulary_signature: string (summary of what makes this author's vocabulary distinctive)

inferential_commitments.argumentative_structure: string (summary of how the argument is built)
hidden_premises: string (premises the author relies on but doesn't state)

source: Created for genealogy_target_profile view — chain-backed accordion
